name: Call Lulu Lamb - Fun Talking
description:
Appelsin Apps creates award-winning apps for kids, 1-5 years old. Entertaining and educational games designed to suit small kids in the best way. No ads and No in-app purchases, everything is included.

Call Lulu Lamb is a FREE "play and learn" app tested by children around 1-5 years old. The interface is clear, interactive and supports iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. Great free app to introduce your kids, toddlers, preschoolers and babies to and entertain them with in a kid-friendly way.

Call Lulu Lamb support English, Danish, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Norwegian and Swedish. If you like this free app for kids please check out our other games for preschoolers and toddlers, you find them all at our website www.appelsinapps.com.

We do not track behavior, analyze nor share information in our games.
http://www.appelsinapps.com/privacy-policy

Does your child like to play Call Lulu Lamb? Please leave a review and let us know! For any other issues please contact us at support@appelsinapps.com.
